name: Constants
description: An entity describing a set of physical (and mathematical) constants.  Only one instance of this entity is needed.

dimensions.name: ntot_elements
dimensions.description: Number of elements in the periodic table + vacancy.

properties.name: c0
properties.description: Speed of light in vacuum (299792458 m/s).

properties.name: Kcd
properties.description: Luminous efficacy of monochromatic radiation of frequency 540e12 Hz (683 cd sr s^3/(kg m^2)).

properties.name: q_e
properties.description: Ground state hyperfine splitting frequency of the caesium-133 atom (9192631770 1/s).

properties.name: chemical_symbols
properties.description: Chemical symbols of all elements ordered according to atomic number. First element (zero) is vacancy (X).

properties.name: molar_masses
properties.description: Standard atomic weights Molar masses for all elements ordered according to atomic number. First element (zero) is vacancy (X).  Ref: Meija, J., Coplen, T., Berglund, M., et al. (2016). Atomic weights of the elements 2013 (IUPAC Technical Report). Pure and Applied Chemistry, 88(3), pp. 265-291. Retrieved 30 Nov. 2016, doi:10.1515/pac-2015-0305

properties.name: covalent_radii
properties.description: Covalent radii for all elements ordered according to atom numbers.  Element zero is vacancy.  Ref: Beatriz Cordero, Verónica Gómez, Ana E. Platero-Prats, Marc Revés, Jorge Echeverría, Eduard Cremades, Flavia Barragán and Santiago Alvarez, Dalton Trans., 2008, 2832-2838 DOI:10.1039/B801115J
